## QuestionType enum

Type of a security question.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum QuestionType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Custom | <code>1</code> | A user-defined security question ([Question.number](./core.question.number.md) &gt; 100). |
|  Regular | <code>0</code> | A security question from a standard predefined list of questions ([Question.number](./core.question.number.md) &lt;<!-- -->= 100). |
